scripts.build: sudo apt-get install php-sqlite3 -y && cd app && cp .env.example .env && composer install && php artisan key:generate
scripts.start: cd ./app && composer install && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve
scripts.refresh: cd ./app && composer install && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && php artisan migrate:refresh --force
scripts.test: cd ./app && composer install && cp .env.example .env && php artisan key:generate && ./vendor/bin/phpunit
